timeline.message: IGNITE-7276 - clear statistics for cluster group started

timeline.author: ptupitsyn
ptupitsyn

timeline.bodyText: Do we really need this suppression? Is there a warning? Same for the method above.
timeline.author: ptupitsyn
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -259,5 +259,12 @@ public interface IClusterGroup

         [SuppressMessage("Microsoft.Design", "CA1024:UsePropertiesWhereAppropriate", Justification = "Semantics.")]
         void EnableStatistics(IEnumerable<string> cacheNames, bool enabled);
+
+        /// <summary>
